location: Jinan Road Section 2, Zhongzheng District, near Zhongxiao Xinsheng MRT
notes: Entire-floor 1BR apartment in an 11-story elevator building on Jinan Rd Sec 2, well-furnished with fridge, washer, AC, sofa, and bed. Excellent transit access (107m to bus stop, ~600m to Zhongxiao Xinsheng MRT). Has one balcony which would need baby-proofing; no photos available to assess railing safety, sharp corners, or overall modernity. No pets allowed; NT$3000/month management fee is additional. Two-month deposit required.
